backlog.description: Validate survey weights and replicate design
Exploratory weighted summaries for key outcomes
Profile missingness patterns for key variables
Draft robustness checks for priority hypotheses
Assess feasibility of social support predictor given 97% missingness
Draft confirmatory model equations/code skeleton for PAP freeze
Verify instrument equivalence for social support items (tmt46e6 vs 71mn55g)
Freeze PAP and tag reproducibility checkpoint
Plan FDR procedure and robustness execution scripts
Run confirmatory models for HYP-001 and HYP-003 per frozen PAP
Integrate robustness outputs into confirmatory reporting and update results flags
Update findings report and manuscript with FDR-adjusted estimates and robustness narrative
Synthesize robustness QC outputs and archive summary memo
Plan CSA-anxiety scale diagnostics and subgroup heterogeneity checks
Execute convergent validity diagnostics for anxiety item (Module M3)
Develop CSA-anxiety interaction scripts and QC templates
Investigate unexpected positive self-regulation correlations and document implications

next_actions.description: Develop CSA-anxiety interaction scripts and QC templates
Investigate unexpected positive self-regulation correlations from convergence diagnostics

notes: PAP frozen 2025-11-04T10:06Z; confirmatory HC3 OLS executed 2025-11-04T10:17Z with seed 20251016. FDR adjustment archived to tables/fdr_adjustment_confirmatory.csv. Robustness memo `qc/robustness_summary.md` and CSA-anxiety diagnostics plan `analysis/csa_anxiety_diagnostics_plan.md` recorded 2025-11-04T14:05Z. Convergent validity diagnostics executed 2025-11-04T20:35Z; depression/stress align, while self-love/calm positive correlations require follow-up via T-018/T-019.
